nodes.text: A farrier rasp was a tool used for the smithy. It was generally used by blacksmiths to coarsely shaping wood or other material.[source?]

By the year 34 ABY, the Force-sensitive stable hand Temiri Blagg wore a farrier rasp tied to his belt frequently during his days of forced labor at the Canto Bight racetrack of Canto Bight, Cantonica.
